name: Awakened Magic Stone, the Earth
text:
If your J/ruler isn't "Lumia, the Fated Rebirth" or "Lumia, Saint of the Crimson Lotus", this card enters your field rested unless you pay 300 life.
Treat this card as a light magic stone and a fire magic stone.
T: Produce W or R.
When you do judgment of a light ruler â‡’ Recover this card.
